parts.text:
```json
{
  "trip_summary": {
    "from": "Tokyo",
    "to": "Hokkaido",
    "best_travel_options": [
      "Flight to Sapporo, then train to other Hokkaido locations.",
      "Shinkansen to Hakodate, then explore Hokkaido by train or car."
    ],
    "estimated_budget_range": "$1000 - $3000 (excluding accommodations)",
    "summary_description": "Explore Hokkaido's stunning natural beauty, delicious cuisine, and unique culture. From the vibrant city of Sapporo to the serene landscapes of Furano and Hakodate, Hokkaido offers a diverse range of experiences.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/hokkaido_landscape.jpg"
  },
  "transportation": [
    [
      {
        "method": "Flight",
        "service_provider": "All Nippon Airways (ANA)",
        "service_number": "NH 61",
        "from": "Haneda Airport (HND)",
        "to": "New Chitose Airport (CTS)",
        "departure_terminal": "2",
        "arrival_terminal": "Domestic Terminal",
        "duration": "1h 30m",
        "cost_range": "$100 - $300",
        "booking_link": "https://www.ana.co.jp/en/",
        "icon_url": "https://example.com/ana_logo.png",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/ana_airplane.jpg"
      }
    ],
    [
      {
        "method": "Train",
        "service_provider": "Hokkaido Shinkansen",
        "service_number": "Hayabusa",
        "from": "Tokyo Station",
        "from_platform": "20-23",
        "to": "Shin-Hakodate-Hokuto Station",
        "to_platform": "11-12",
        "seat_class": "Ordinary / Green Car",
        "estimated_cost_range": "$200 - $300",
        "duration": "4h",
        "booking_link": "https://www.jr-pass.com/shinkansen",
        "icon_url": "https://example.com/shinkansen_logo.png",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/hokkaido_shinkansen.jpg"
      },
      {
        "method": "Train",
        "service_provider": "JR Limited Express Hokuto",
        "service_number": "12",
        "from": "Shin-Hakodate-Hokuto Station",
        "from_platform": "1",
        "to": "Sapporo Station",
        "to_platform": "5",
        "seat_class": "Reserved Seat",
        "estimated_cost_range": "$50 - $80",
        "duration": "3h 30m",
        "booking_link": "https://www.jrhokkaido.co.jp/global/english/index.html",
        "icon_url": "https://example.com/jr_hokuto_logo.png",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/jr_hokuto.jpg"
      }
    ]
  ],
  "accommodations": [],
  "attractions": [
    {
      "name": "Sapporo Snow Festival",
      "description": "A famous winter festival held annually in Sapporo, featuring impressive snow and ice sculptures.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Early February",
      "entry_fee": "Free",
      "location": "Odori Park, Sapporo",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/sapporo_snow_festival.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "Farm Tomita",
      "description": "A picturesque lavender farm in Furano, known for its vibrant fields of flowers.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "July",
      "entry_fee": "Free",
      "location": "Furano, Hokkaido",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/farm_tomita.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "Hakodate Mount Hakodate",
      "description": "Offers panoramic views of Hakodate city, especially stunning at night.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Year-round, best at night",
      "entry_fee": "Free (Cable car fee applies)",
      "location": "Hakodate, Hokkaido",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/hakodate_mount_hakodate.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "food_recommendations": [
    {
      "dish_name": "Sapporo Ramen",
      "description": "Rich miso-based ramen topped with buttered corn, a Hokkaido specialty.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Ramen Shingen, Sapporo",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/sapporo_ramen.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish_name": "Seafood Donburi",
      "description": "Fresh seafood served over rice, showcasing Hokkaido's abundant marine resources.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Hakodate Morning Market, Hakodate",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/seafood_donburi.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish_name": "Jingisukan (Grilled Lamb)",
      "description": "Grilled lamb dish cooked on a special dome-shaped grill.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Local street markets or Popular restaurants",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/jingisukan.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish_name": "Hokkaido Melon",
      "description": "Known for its sweetness and flavor. A must-try fruit in Hokkaido",
      "best_place_to_try": "Local street markets or Popular restaurants",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/hokkaido_melon.jpg"
    },
      {
      "dish_name": "Uni (Sea Urchin)",
      "description": "Fresh sea urchin, often served as sashimi or in donburi. Hokkaido is famous for its high-quality uni.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Local street markets or Popular restaurants",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/hokkaido_uni.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "travel_tips": [
    "Hokkaido has distinct seasons, so pack accordingly.",
    "Consider purchasing a Hokkaido Rail Pass if you plan to travel extensively by train.",
    "Rent a car to explore the rural areas of Hokkaido at your own pace."
  ]
}
```
